name: Japanese Design Philosophy
description: Japanese design emphasizes harmony with nature, minimalism, and the beauty of imperfection.

principles.name: Wabi-Sabi
principles.description: Finding beauty in imperfection and impermanence
principles.application: Use natural materials, embrace asymmetry, celebrate aging

principles.name: Ma (Negative Space)
principles.description: The power of emptiness and pause in design
principles.application: Create breathing room, strategic emptiness, mindful spacing

principles.name: Kanso (Simplicity)
principles.description: Eliminating clutter and expressing more with less
principles.application: Clean lines, essential elements only, functional beauty

guidelines: Use natural materials: wood, bamboo, stone, paper
Maintain low furniture and eye levels
Create spaces for contemplation and quiet
